reviewText: These aren't bad as educational supplements, although what's questionable is their objectivity and balance. Judge for yourself.
DVD brand new and the shipping was extremely quick.

This was such a fun and informative overview of the 33rd-44th American Presidents. The documentary is a mix of cartoon whimsy and historians discussing the effective highs, lows and all the in between of each presidents term from Carter to Obama. A fantastic purchase for any middle/high/ or home school classroom for Social studies.

We homeschool our four children, and this DVD along with the other four in the series are absolutely awesome teaching tools.  The DVD's teach about our presidents in a very funny & whimsical way that entertains the kids, and holds their attention while teaching them at the same time.  I highly recommend these DVD's for any and all families, but especially families who homeschool their children.
